Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

What should be improved in the website? 

  o The chat 
  o The background 
  o The picture of the main page 
  o Members's section (Updating) 
  o Matrix's section 
  o Add a profile in Member's section 
  o The Forum 
  o More links 
  o Event's section should be updated frecuently 
  o Update Rules everytime that they change 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
